sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const roomData = [ { name: "Family Suite", beds: "3 Double beds", capacity: "6 Capacity", features: [ "Orthopedic Bed", "Split-Type Inverter Aircon", "Private Restroom with Hot and Cold Shower", "Coffee set-up", "Free Wi-Fi Access" ], image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506744038136-46273834b3fb?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80" }, { name: "Junior Suite", beds: "1 Queen & 1 Single Bed", capacity: "3 Capacity", features: [ "Orthopedic Bed", "Split-Type Inverter Aircon", "Private Restroom with Hot and Cold Shower", "Coffee set-up", "Free Wi-Fi Access" ], image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1512918728675-ed5a9ecdebfd?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80" }, { name: "Twin Superior", beds: "2 Single Beds", capacity: "2 Capacity", features: [ "Orthopedic Bed", "Split-Type Inverter Aircon", "Private Restroom with Hot and Cold Shower", "Coffee set-up", "Free Wi-Fi Access" ], image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507089947368-19c1da9775ae?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80" }, { name: "Double Superior", beds: "1 Double Bed", capacity: "2 Capacity", features: [ "Orthopedic Bed", "Split-Type Inverter Aircon", "Private Restroom with Hot and Cold Shower", "Coffee set-up", "Free Wi-Fi Access" ], image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1464983953574-0892a716854b?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80" }, { name: "Studio Room", beds: "1 Double Bed", capacity: "2 Capacity", features: [ "Orthopedic Bed", "Split-Type Inverter Aircon", "Private Restroom with Hot and Cold Shower", "Coffee set-up", "Free Wi-Fi Access" ], image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519974719765-e6559eac2575?auto=format&fit=crop&w=400&q=80" } ]; const prices = [3300, 2200, 1600, 1500, 1400]; function Rooms() { return (

Room Management

{roomData.map((room, idx) => (
{room.name}
{room.beds} • {room.capacity}
₱{prices[idx].toLocaleString()} / night
Features:
    {room.features.map(f =>
  • {f}
    • )}
{/* Admin actions can go here, e.g. Edit/Delete buttons */}
))}
); } export default Rooms;
